title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: If you win the standard mode, do u still get the summoner icon or is it just for gauntlet?
Is there any extra rewards for defeating doombots at level 100?
Is it possible to get the doombots icon?

it says it in the thread :P
"but any players who defeat a Doom Bots level will earn the Little Devil Teemo Icon for all eternity."

Also
"Any players who leave a game of Doom Bots forfeit their icon.

Icon will appear in your account up to one week after defeating the Doom Bots."

He might be referring to the actual doombot icon, that the bots have in the game mode, 

You could get it by winning games of doom bots last time it was up.
yeah i was refering to the one you could recieve last year, but thanks anyways :)
Did Teemo get buffed or something because he had 50k hp in PBE at lvl 100, but he has 100k in live games.
as long as i get dat icon{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
When your league of legends client crashes right before Doom Bots and you have to re-install league... Fml. {{champion:32}}
I have waited for so long {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
